page.title: 15ATTITUDES IN UMBERLEIGH
page.content: What do people currently talk and think about in Umberleigh? The weather is an important topic of conversation. Some times people dont want it to rain like farmers because they are making hay and they can not take it to the farm because it would be wet. Neighbours often talk together about rabbits that go on their gardens. They discuss putting nets over their plants. The livestock market in Barnstaple on Tuesday is discussed regularly. Farmers take their sheep and cows and sell them to other farmers.
